casebody.data:
ROBERTS
v.
McALLISTER. No. 686A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 3, 2006. Ingrid K. Friesen, for Michael W. McAllister.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of December 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Susan Roberts) shall have up to and including the 1st day of February 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of January 2006."
